Package index

Workflow Facades

High-level functions for streamlined analysis

load_sge_data()
Load SGE data from files
prepare_count_matrices()
Prepare count matrices for analysis
analyze_screens()
Run differential analysis on all screens
generate_qc_plots()
Generate QC plots
generate_results()
Generate analysis results
prepare_gene_level_data()
Prepare gene-level dataset from targeton results

S7 Class Definitions for sgeasy

SGEData Class
SGEResults()
SGEResults Class

Normalization

Size factor estimation from control data

estimate_size_factors()
Estimate size factors from control data
compute_control_size_factors()
Compute size factors from control oligos

Data Wrangling

Matrix creation and filtering

create_normalization_matrix()
Create normalization matrix from neutral variants
create_count_matrix()
Create count matrix from annotated data
filter_by_counts()
Filter variants by count thresholds
slim_consequence()
Simplify variant consequence annotations
calculate_position_effect()
Calculate position effect ratios
remove_artefacts()
Remove artefact variants

Differential Analysis

DESeq2-based differential abundance and post-processing

run_differential_analysis()
Run differential abundance analysis
post_process()
Post-process screen results with annotation
recalculate_screen_statistics()
Recalculate screen statistics
calculate_median_scores()
Calculate median scores for log2 fold changes
adjust_all_contrasts()
Adjust statistics for all contrasts
classify_all_contrasts()
Classify variants for all contrasts
classify_variants()
Classify variants by consequence type
get_replicated_variants()
Find replicated variants
reweight_replicated_variants()
Reweight replicated variants using inverse variance weighting

Visualization

Plotting functions

plot_gene_level_waterfall()
Plot functional scores along genomic coordinates
plot_condition_scores()
Plot z-scores for a single condition contrast
plot_all_conditions()
Generate plots for all condition contrasts

Write waterfall plots to files
plot_ridgeline()
Plot ridgeline density distributions by group
plot_consequence_jitter()
Plot jittered strip chart by group

Create sample comparison scatter plots
sample_distance_matrix()
Create sample distance matrix heatmap
plot_distance_matrices()
Save distance matrix plots to files
build_sample_pca()
Build PCA plot from rlog data
plot_screen_pcas()
Save PCA plots to files
position_effect_plot()
Plot position effect ratios
plot_position_effects()
Save position effect ratio plots to files

Default color palette for consequence types
classification_shapes

Default consequence categories for distribution plots

Domain Visualization

Protein domain fetching and heatmap visualization

fetch_domains_ted()
Fetch protein domains from TED (The Encyclopedia of Domains)
fetch_domains_interpro()
Fetch protein domains from InterPro REST API
fetch_domains_ensembl()
Fetch protein domains from Ensembl REST API
fetch_plddt_alphafold()
Fetch per-residue pLDDT scores from AlphaFold Database
merge_overlapping_domains()
Merge overlapping domain ranges
filter_protein_altering_variants()
Filter dataset to protein_altering variants for heatmap visualization
prepare_amino_acid_heatmap_data()
Prepare data for amino acid heatmap visualization
plot_domain_track()
Plot protein domain track
plot_plddt_track()
Plot pLDDT confidence track
plot_amino_acid_heatmap()
Plot amino acid substitution heatmap
plot_domain_heatmap()
Plot combined domain track and amino acid heatmap
amino_acid_order
Standard amino acid ordering for heatmap y-axis
classification_heatmap_colours
Classification colours for amino acid heatmap
plddt_colours
AlphaFold pLDDT confidence colour scheme
